select * from ( select rownum as rno, patient_no, child_dept_name, patient_name, patient_jubun, patient_gender, patient_visitdate from ( select patient_no, child_dept_name, patient_name, patient_jubun, patient_gender, patient_visitdate from tbl_patient a join tbl_child_dept b on a.fk_child_dept_no = b.child_dept_no where patient_waiting = 1
and patient_name like '%'|| #{patientname} ||'%'
order by patient_visitdate desc ) where rownum <= #{endRno} ) where rno BETWEEN to_number(#{startRno}) AND to_number(#{endRno})
select patient_jubun from tbl_patient where patient_no = to_number(#{seq})

select patient_name, patient_gender, patient_status, order_no , case when sysdate - to_date( to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') || substr(patient_jubun, 3, 4), 'yyyymmdd') >= 0 then extract(year from sysdate) - to_number( case when substr(patient_jubun, 8, 1) in('1','2') then '19' else '20' end || substr(patient_jubun, 1, 2) ) else extract(year from sysdate) - to_number( case when substr(patient_jubun, 8, 1) in('1','2') then '19' else '20' end || substr(patient_jubun, 1, 2) ) - 1 end AS age from tbl_patient a join tbl_order b on a.patient_no = b.fk_patient_no where patient_no = #{seq}

with a as ( select order_no, fk_child_dept_no, patient_visitdate, patient_symptom, order_symptom_detail from tbl_patient a left join tbl_order b on a.patient_no = b.fk_patient_no where patient_jubun = #{jubun} ) select order_no, fk_child_dept_no, child_dept_name, patient_visitdate, patient_symptom, order_symptom_detail from a join tbl_child_dept b on a.fk_child_dept_no = b.child_dept_no order by patient_visitdate desc

select count(*) from ( with a as ( select surgery_no, fk_order_no, fk_patient_no, order_issurg from tbl_surgery a join tbl_order b on a.fk_order_no = b.order_no where order_issurg = 1 and surgery_status = 0 ), b as ( select patient_no, fk_child_dept_no, patient_name, patient_visitdate, child_dept_name, patient_gender, patient_jubun from tbl_patient a join tbl_child_dept b on a.fk_child_dept_no = b.child_dept_no ) select fk_order_no, patient_visitdate, child_dept_name, patient_name, patient_gender, patient_jubun from a join b on a.fk_patient_no = b.patient_no )

select * from ( with a as ( select surgery_no, fk_order_no, fk_patient_no, order_issurg from tbl_surgery a join tbl_order b on a.fk_order_no = b.order_no where order_issurg = 1 and surgery_status = 0 ), b as ( select patient_no, fk_child_dept_no, patient_name, patient_visitdate, child_dept_name, patient_gender, patient_jubun from tbl_patient a join tbl_child_dept b on a.fk_child_dept_no = b.child_dept_no ) select rownum as rno, fk_order_no, patient_visitdate, child_dept_name, patient_name, patient_gender, patient_jubun from a join b on a.fk_patient_no = b.patient_no ) WHERE rno BETWEEN to_number(#{startRno}) AND to_number(#{endRno})
select patient_name from tbl_order a join tbl_patient b on a.fk_patient_no = b.patient_no where order_no = #{order_no}

select to_char(surgery_start_time, 'HH24:MI') as surgery_start_time from tbl_surgery where surgery_surgeryroom_name = #{surgery_surgeryroom_name} and surgery_day = to_date(#{surgery_day}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
